# OmicSignature ### Contact: Vanessa Mengze Li `vmli@bu.edu`
### Last update 12/10/2020
### Installation `devtools::install_github(repo = "montilab/OmicSignature")`
### Description R6 object `OmicSignature` and `OmicSignatureCollection` to store
high-throughput experiment yield signaturess. Go to
<https://montilab.github.io/OmicSignature/> and click the "Articles" at the top
to see vignettes and descriptions of the objects.
### Contact Please contact `vmli at bu.edu` for questions and suggestions!
